module.name: nagios
module.summary: Net Saint / NAGIOS - network monitoring server

interface.name: nagios_read_config
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to read nagios configuration files.

interface.name: nagios_read_tmp_files
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to read nagios temporary files.

interface.name: nagios_domtrans_cgi
interface.summary: Execute the nagios CGI with a domain transition.

interface.name: nagios_domtrans_nrpe
interface.summary: Execute the nagios NRPE with a domain transition.
